Reference: {{ doc.name }}

To: {% set party_found = [] %} {% for row in doc.accounts %} {% if row.party and not party_found %} {{ row.party_name or row.party }} {% set _ = party_found.append(1) %} {% endif %} {% endfor %}

{% for row in doc.accounts %} {% if "Interest Income" in row.account %} {% endif %} {% if "Income Tax Expense" in row.account %} {% endif %} {% endfor %}
Description Amount (USD)
Gross Interest Income (4% p.a)
Period: Up to Dec 31, 2025		 {{ "{:,.2f}".format(row.credit) }}
Less: Foreign Contractor Tax (10%)
Settled by Subsidiary as per agreement		 ({{ "{:,.2f}".format(row.debit) }})
NET AMOUNT DUE (TO BE OFFSET AGAINST INTEREST) {% for row in doc.accounts %} {% if "Interest Receivable" in row.account %} {{ "{:,.2f}".format(row.debit) }} {% endif %} {% endfor %}

Note: This amount is accrued based on the effective interest rate. The FCT portion has been pre-paid by the Subsidiary and will be netted off upon the loan .

Prepared by (Parent)
Confirmed by (Subsidiary)

{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif %}

Date: {{ doc.offer_date }}

Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to appoint you in the services of {{ doc.company }} on the terms and conditions detailed in this letter.

Your designation shall be {{ doc.designation }}.

{%- if doc.offer_terms -%} {%- for row in doc.offer_terms -%} {{ row.offer_term }}: {{ row.value }}
{%- endfor -%} {%- endif -%}
Please read the detailed terms as below. If you have any queries, feel free to get in touch with us. We look forward to your long and fruitful career association with our organisation. If you decide to join us, 'Welcome to {{ doc.company }} !'

Yours truly,



Authorized Signatory
{{ doc.company }}

{{ doc.terms }}
{% endif %}
